analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika rūpa avacara duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ rūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho narūpāvacaro
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na rūpāvacaraḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… ārammaṇe
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe ārammaṇe

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ narūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham na rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na narūpāvacaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
